author: Channel Awesome
description:
Doug gives his thoughts on the hit Marvel game that came out this year. Does Rivals deserve all the hype? Find out now on a new DisneyCember.

Watch all DisneyCember here - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0AQIMR-tpomecW19RN2LNrdoqd5wFu4R

Watch the new NC - https://youtu.be/EkbsPkmj1hQ

Marvel Rivals is a hero shooter video game developed and published by NetEase Games in collaboration with Marvel Games. The game was released for PlayStation 5, Windows, and Xbox Series X/S on December 6, 2024, with a PlayStation 4 version released on September 12, 2025. The game is free-to-play with a current lineup of 45 characters from Marvel Comics, and features cross-play across all supported platforms.
